channel.title: FantilloScape 667/718 [Webclient] [New rsps]
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i1087.photobucket.com/albums/j478/mjbtjb/homeeeee111.jpg[/img] If somehings wrong please correct me I've read the format rules for advertisements c: Simple cheap banner :3 Before I start I'd like to say EVERYTHING on this server is available to Non-Donators (But donators have an easier chance to get them) Link(s); [url=http://fantilloscape.com/index.php?action=forum][IMG]http://i1087.photobucket.com/albums/j478/mjbtjb/Homeimg.png[/img]Forums[/url] [url=http://www.fantilloscape.com/Webclient/FantilloScapeV3.jar][IMG]http://i1087.photobucket.com/albums/j478/mjbtjb/Playnowimg.png[/img]Jar Client[/url] [url=http://fantilloscape.com/index.php?page=WebClient][IMG]http://i1087.photobucket.com/albums/j478/mjbtjb/Playnowimg.png[/img]WebClient[/url]
[SIZE=3]Staff List[/SIZE]
- Developer - [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/out5ye.jpg[/img]NeFF
- Owner/Funds Handler/Client coder - [IMG]http://i28.tinypic.com/2nubde.png[/img]Eskemo
- Administrators - [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/6qwf7m.gif[/img]Coolkid, Alkosor
- Moderator(s) - [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2aj2mc8.gif[/img]React, Mudkip
- Donators - [IMG]http://i32.tinypic.com/e1zpw.png[/img]Ryanbod, Rainbow_dash
-- [SIZE=3]Features[/SIZE] -- 97% Barrows 100% Castlewars 100% Jadinko Caves w/Vine whip drops Custom Lucien boss Glacors with armadyl shards drop Armadyl shards Required to make Orb or armadyl to make Armadyl Battlestaff Almost all skills 100% (Cheap start on Construction) Customized Portal (Actually had to make myself before these assholes released snippets for) New ToKhaar-Jad Cheap started Har-Aken boss Custom kill system for Firecape and ToKhaar-Kal Custom Ring that boosts lp by 1k (Not available In-Game yet) New special attack for Thoks Sword (Donaters have an easier way to get it but it's usable by ALL players) Custom dungeoneering w/a Kill count system and a special chest able to be opened every 100 kills for extra tokens and random items! Added a bones-on-altar system Easy and fast combat leveling (skilling exp is same as rs to keep a decent eco) Switching Better then rs! Near flawless pking system 3 different donator ranks (Able to make deals for rsgp/IrL money) Friendly and helpful staff Mature owner that replys within minutes not hours! New slayer area being added for slayer points/Leveling Working effigies Loyalty system added with rewards for players! (auto-kicked every 30 minutes of gameplay) Logging messages for Staff (so players arent tricked into other players being staff) Bossing points system with rewards chest to promote bossing in the community Since the new emote tab causes lag on 667's i made them commands :D Warped floors for donators are being added soon! Also dungeoneering bosses as bal'lak and warmonger are being added! Updates everyday to keep a up-to-date server!
Some media [IMG]http://i1087.photobucket.com/albums/j478/mjbtjb/Dung1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1087.photobucket.com/albums/j478/mjbtjb/boss1-1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1087.photobucket.com/albums/j478/mjbtjb/jadinkos.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1087.photobucket.com/albums/j478/mjbtjb/Lucien.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1087.photobucket.com/albums/j478/mjbtjb/tokhaar-jad4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1087.photobucket.com/albums/j478/mjbtjb/loyalty8.png[/img][/center]

item.title: FantilloScape 667/718 [Webclient] [New rsps]
item.dc:creator: @NeFFy NeFFy
item.description:
@NeFFy wrote:

[center]
If somehings wrong please correct me I’ve read the format rules for advertisements c:
Simple cheap banner :3
Before I start I’d like to say EVERYTHING on this server is available to Non-Donators (But donators have an easier chance to get them)
Link(s);
Forums
Jar Client
WebClient

[SIZE=3]Staff List[/SIZE]

  • Developer -
    NeFF

  • Owner/Funds Handler/Client coder -
    Eskemo

  • Administrators -
    Coolkid, Alkosor

  • Moderator(s) -
    React, Mudkip

  • Donators -
    Ryanbod, Rainbow_dash

– [SIZE=3]Features[/SIZE] –
97% Barrows
100% Castlewars
100% Jadinko Caves w/Vine whip drops
Custom Lucien boss
Glacors with armadyl shards drop
Armadyl shards Required to make Orb or armadyl to make Armadyl Battlestaff
Almost all skills 100% (Cheap start on Construction)
Customized Portal (Actually had to make myself before these assholes released snippets for)
New ToKhaar-Jad
Cheap started Har-Aken boss
Custom kill system for Firecape and ToKhaar-Kal
Custom Ring that boosts lp by 1k (Not available In-Game yet)
New special attack for Thoks Sword (Donaters have an easier way to get it but it’s usable by ALL players)
Custom dungeoneering w/a Kill count system and a special chest able to be opened every 100 kills for extra tokens and random items!
Added a bones-on-altar system
Easy and fast combat leveling (skilling exp is same as rs to keep a decent eco)
Switching Better then rs!
Near flawless pking system
3 different donator ranks (Able to make deals for rsgp/IrL money)
Friendly and helpful staff
Mature owner that replys within minutes not hours!
New slayer area being added for slayer points/Leveling
Working effigies
Loyalty system added with rewards for players! (auto-kicked every 30 minutes of gameplay)
Logging messages for Staff (so players arent tricked into other players being staff)
Bossing points system with rewards chest to promote bossing in the community
Since the new emote tab causes lag on 667’s i made them commands
Warped floors for donators are being added soon!
Also dungeoneering bosses as bal’lak and warmonger are being added!
Updates everyday to keep a up-to-date server!

Some media

Dung1.png955×479



tokhaar-jad4.png1024×466

[/center]
